entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 20S IN THE AFTERNOON
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY, COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 16
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 19
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
